issue.message: The image `ic_stat_sda.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/ic_stat_sda.png: 24x24 dp (36x36 px), drawable-mdpi/ic_stat_sda.png: 24x24 dp (24x24 px), drawable-xhdpi/ic_stat_sda.png: 24x24 dp (48x48 px), drawable-xxxhdpi/ic_stat_sda.png: 18x18 dp (72x72 px)
Missing density variation folders in `src/main/res`: drawable-xxhdpi
